description.value:
This rod of fast-burning incense creates a haze of smoke that holds beasts at bay.

Make an attack: Close burst 1; targets beasts only; +20 vs. Fortitude; the burst creates a zone, and targets that are hit slide to the closest square outside the zone. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter, and beasts that move into an affected square or begin their turn in an affected square are subject to the same attack from the beastbane.
